content:
ICodePackageActivationContext ICodePackageActivationContext Interface

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Represents activation context for the Service Fabric activated service.

Edit

In this Article

public interface ICodePackageActivationContext : IDisposablePublic Interface ICodePackageActivationContext
    Inherits IDisposable

Inherited Members

System.IDisposable

Dispose()Dispose()

Remarks

Includes information from the service manifest as well as information about the currently activated code package like work directory, context id etc.

Properties

ApplicationName ApplicationName

Edit

Gets the application name.

string ApplicationName { get; }ReadOnly Property ApplicationName As String
Value
String String

The name of the application.

ApplicationTypeName ApplicationTypeName

Edit

Gets the application type name.

string ApplicationTypeName { get; }ReadOnly Property ApplicationTypeName As String
Value
String String

The name of the application type.

CodePackageName CodePackageName

Edit

Gets the name of the fabric activated code package.

string CodePackageName { get; }ReadOnly Property CodePackageName As String
Value
String String

The name of the fabric activated code package.

CodePackageVersion CodePackageVersion

Edit

Gets the version of the fabric activated code package.

string CodePackageVersion { get; }ReadOnly Property CodePackageVersion As String
Value
String String

The version of the fabric activated code package.

ContextId ContextId

Edit

Gets the context id.

string ContextId { get; }ReadOnly Property ContextId As String
Value
String String

The context id.

Remarks

The context id is the same for all code packages in the same service manifest.

LogDirectory LogDirectory

Edit

Gets the path to the Log directory that the application can use.

string LogDirectory { get; }ReadOnly Property LogDirectory As String
Value
String String

The path to the code package Log directory.

TempDirectory TempDirectory

Edit

Gets the path to the Temp directory that the application can use.

string TempDirectory { get; }ReadOnly Property TempDirectory As String
Value
String String

The path to the code package Temp directory.

WorkDirectory WorkDirectory

Edit

Gets the path to the Work directory that the application can use.

string WorkDirectory { get; }ReadOnly Property WorkDirectory As String
Value
String String

The path to the code package Work directory.

Returns
IList<String> IList(Of String)

The list of code package names in the service manifest.

GetCodePackageObject(String) GetCodePackageObject(String)

Edit

Returns the CodePackage object from Service Package that matches the desired package name.

CodePackage GetCodePackageObject(string packageName)Function GetCodePackageObject(packageName As String) As CodePackage
Parameters
packageName
String String

The name of the code package.

Returns
CodePackage CodePackage

The CodePackage object from Service Package that matches the desired package name.

Remarks

Throws KeyNotFoundException exception if the package is not found.
